Headline: Money -> Wealth Generating Machine
Comment: Great insight! It's important to educate ourselves and our children about the truth behind processed foods. Athletes may play a small role, but clever marketing preys on the gullible. Let's prioritize whole foods for a healthier lifestyle.

Headline: SVP & Branch Head II HSBC Bank II Pune II Wealth Management, Personal Finance, Retail Banking & Wealth Tech l Ex-ICICI, Aviva, Net4India
Building SVATAH: | Financial Literacy | Teach For India
Comment:
This is very important, especially for students!! 

Recently, I was at a teacher training program where one of the teachers asked me: 'Sir, you are asking us to teach all these good habits to our students, but with the 'heroes' endorsing these products, students think that eating/using those products will make them heroes. How do we ensure that they do not get influenced by these, especially when they are given national recognition awards like Padma Bhushan?', and as an educator myself, I felt his pain! 

What can we do to ensure kids are not influenced by these advertisements?
